name: 4chan simple image gallery
description:
Removes all text discussions from 4chan threads, so that only the images remain as a simple clean gallery.

This userstyle doesn't effect you while browsing the boards, but the threads only.
(not "boards.4chan.org/[boardname]/", but "boards.4chan.org/[boardname]/res/*")
additional_info:
ps: the gallery layout may suck a bit. but does the work.

- tested only in Firefox v.15.*
